price: 71. (Atminkite), kai jūsų Viešpats sakė angelams: „Tikrai aš ketinu sukurti žmogų iš molio.“
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
